definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
bamboo or wooden spear/Kangxi radical 79, occurring in 段, 毅, 殺 etc
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)
to submerge/to drown/to flood/to drown out (also fig.)
to come and go/to roam about (mostly unseen)/(of a ghost) to haunt (a place)/(of a criminal) to stalk (the streets)/(of the sun) to rise and set

sentences.english: I'm sorry, I'm not in a position to help you financially.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，我没办法在财务上帮你忙。

sentences.english: And you express that "I'm feeling this way, is it ok?"
sentences.chinese: 你可以表达“我有这样子的感觉，没问题吧？”
没人生来就会使用筷子。

sentences.english: There'sno need for that kind of language in this magazine .
sentences.chinese: 这份杂志没必要出现那种语言。

sentences.english: With their help, all the apples were picked and put back on the cart.
sentences.chinese: 侥幸的是，苏和汽车司机都没受伤。

sentences.english: "The software company did not charge us too much, " says Feng.
sentences.chinese: “那家软件公司也没跟我们要很多钱，”冯说。

sentences.english: For the first three days, they ate nothing.
sentences.chinese: 头三天，他们什么也没吃。

sentences.english: The Bible tells us to forgive our enemies; not our friends. – Margot Asquith.
sentences.chinese: 圣经告诉我原谅我们的敌人，但没说要原谅朋友。

sentences.english: " You this bag is very special, fell into the water and no water wet".
sentences.chinese: “你这个包还真是很特别，掉进水里也没进水湿掉”。

sentences.english: It is not cogitation; it is a waste of life.
sentences.chinese: 其实没必要想那么多，那只是在浪费生命。

sentences.english: See, I stopped at the red traffic light, and I swear it never turned green!
sentences.chinese: 红灯亮了，我踩了脚刹车，谁知道那灯再没变绿过。

sentences.english: Manny: Of course it's still work in progress. Few rough edges, here and there.
sentences.chinese: 当然了，这工程还没完工还有些边边角角要处理。

sentences.english: She gave us food and clothes and asked for nothing in return.
sentences.chinese: 她给了我们食物和衣服，没求任何回报。

sentences.english: What helped the honeyeater elude discovery was it's silent nature.
sentences.chinese: 由于这种食蜜雀的沉默的特性使得它一直没被发现。

sentences.english: Hard to drink, and drink around a long time that nothing effects.
sentences.chinese: 好难喝的，周围长时间喝的说没啥效果。

sentences.english: Ting Wen before the train, he jumped onto the platform.
sentences.chinese: 火车还没停稳，他就跳上了月台。

definition: at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
to be dead/not to be, or cease to exist

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]
